Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler

Class WolfScheduler

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_scheduler.scheduler.WolfScheduler
public class WolfScheduler extends Object
This program creates a "WolfScheduler" object which is as schedule containing courses users can do various things with their schedules.
Author:
Max Farthing

    Constructor that uses filename for course records that is stored in array list of courses.

  • Method Details

    • getCourseFromCatalog

      public Course getCourseFromCatalog(String name, String section)
      this method iterates through catalog of courses and returns the course if it matches the name and section or null if course does not exist
      Parameters:
      name - name of class
      section - section of class
      Returns:
      Course if exists

    • addCourseToSchedule

      public boolean addCourseToSchedule(String name, String section)
      allows courses to be added to the schedule if course exists and if not already enrolled in course with the same name
      Parameters:
      name - the name of course
      section - the section number of course
      Returns:
      boolean whether course can be added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if already enrolled in course

    • removeActivityFromSchedule

      public boolean removeActivityFromSchedule(int idx)
      allows courses to be removed from schedule
      Parameters:
      idx - id number
      Returns:
      boolean whether course and can be removed or not

    • resetSchedule

      public void resetSchedule()
      resets the schedule back to blank

    • getCourseCatalog

      public String[][] getCourseCatalog()
      getter method for course catalog, returns catalog as 2d array if catalog is empty return empty array otherwise return array with all courses in catalog along with names section and title as columns
      Returns:
      catalog as a 2d array

    • getScheduledActivities

      public String[][] getScheduledActivities()
      getter method for course schedule, returns catalog as 2d array if schedule is empty return empty array otherwise return array with all courses in schedule along with names section and title as columns
      Returns:
      schedule as a 2d array

    • getFullScheduledActivities

      public String[][] getFullScheduledActivities()
      getter method for a FULL course schedule, returns catalog as 2d array if schedule is empty return empty array otherwise return array with all courses in schedule along with names, section, title, credits, instructorId, and Meeting days as columns
      Returns:
      full schedule as a 2d array

    • setScheduleTitle

      public void setScheduleTitle(String string)
      Setter method for setting the title name of schedule
      Parameters:
      string - the title name of schedule as a string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if title is null

    • getScheduleTitle

      public String getScheduleTitle()
      getter method for title name
      Returns:
      title name as a string

    • exportSchedule

      public void exportSchedule(String filename)
      exports schedule to a file through the CourseRecordIO write course method
      Parameters:
      filename - of the file where schedule will be saved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be saved

    • addEventToSchedule

      public void addEventToSchedule(String eventTitle, String eventMeetingDays, int eventStartTime, int eventEndTime, String eventDetails)
      adds event to schedule if it is not a duplicate
      Parameters:
      eventTitle - title of event
      eventMeetingDays - days the event meets
      eventStartTime - start time of event
      eventEndTime - end time of the event
      eventDetails - the details of the event
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if event is already created
